headline: Berkshire Hathaway: Compounding Becomes More Challenging, But Not Broken
summary: Berkshire Hathaway maintains its enduring business model as Greg Abel assumes the CEO role, despite cyclical headwinds. Read why BRK.A stock is a buy.

raw.headline: Berkshire Hathaway: Compounding Becomes More Challenging, But Not Broken

headline: Greg Abel Charts Berkshire's Future With Focus on Stewardship and Sustainable Growth
summary: On Saturday, Berkshire Hathaway Inc. (NYSE: BRK-A) (NYSE: BRK-B) new CEO Gregory E. Abel's shared his first annual shareholder letter, laying out how the company plans to keep its stewardship-first culture intact after the handoff from Warren Buffett.

raw.headline: Greg Abel Charts Berkshire's Future With Focus on Stewardship and Sustainable Growth
raw.summary: On Saturday, Berkshire Hathaway Inc. (NYSE: BRK-A) (NYSE: BRK-B) new CEO Gregory E. Abel's shared his first annual shareholder letter, laying out how the company plans to keep its stewardship-first culture intact after the handoff from Warren Buffett.

headline: All the highlights from Berkshire CEO Abel's first shareholder letter
summary: After two months on the job, new Berkshire Hathaway CEO Greg Abel emphasizes he won't be making major changes to the way the company has operated for decades under Warren Buffett's leadership.

raw.headline: All the highlights from Berkshire CEO Abel's first shareholder letter
